LUXURY FRAGRANCE - Since 1975, Milton-Lloyd have earned an unshakeable reputation for award-winning, luxury fragrances without the luxury price tag. ELEGANT, RICH AND FRUITY - Fresh, top notes of bergamot and watermelon are boosted by floral mid notes of jasmine rose and violet, with base notes of oakmoss, amber and precious patchouli. LONG LASTING - Colour Me Purple contains luxury oils, blended at high concentrations to promise outstanding quality and long-lasting performance.
